name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Molla - Stay focused and block distractions

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Molla helps you stay focused on your goals by redirecting away from specific content that is not aligned with them, instead of…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Molla helps you stay focused on your goals by redirecting away from specific content that is not aligned with them, instead of blocking sites altogether.

✅ Set your goals: Specify your goals for 2024 and for the day. Molla will use these to help you stay focused.

✅ Specify your focus times: These are the days and times when Molla will help you stay focused.

✅ Use smart redirection: Based on your goals, Molla will analyze YouTube videos (more site support is coming) you watch to ensure they align with your goals while you’re in focus time. Unlike other site blockers, it will only redirect you away from content that distracts you from your goals, instead of just blocking sites altogether.

Molla isn't just an extension; it's a commitment to yourself. It's a decision to invest your online time in a way that brings you closer to your ambitions. 

Whether you're working towards personal development, educational achievements, or professional milestones; Molla is here to ensure that your journey online is one that consistently reflects your dedication to your goals.

Take the first step towards a more focused and intentional online experience by adding Molla to Chrome today. Your goals are waiting, and Molla is here to get you there.

*5 November 2024 - Smart redirect is super fast!
